entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or drizzle after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of drizzle in the morning. Fog patches. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to flurries or freezing drizzle in the evening. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016
